  • Sites API

Sites API

Endpoints for managing websites and their accessibility scores.

List Sites‚Äã

Get all monitored sites.

GET /api/sites

Authentication‚Äã

  • Session cookie (web frontend)
  • API key with sites:read scope

Response‚Äã

{
  "data": [
    {
      "id": "123",
      "name": "ICJIA Main Website",
      "url": "https://www.icjia.state.il.us",
      "axe_score": 85,
      "lighthouse_score": 90,
      "created_at": "2024-01-15T10:30:00Z",
      "updated_at": "2024-01-20T14:45:00Z"
    }
  ]
}

Get Site Details‚Äã

Get information about a specific site.

GET /api/sites/:id

Parameters‚Äã

NameTypeDescription
idstringSite ID

Response‚Äã

{
  "data": {
    "id": "123",
    "name": "ICJIA Main Website",
    "url": "https://www.icjia.state.il.us",
    "axe_score": 85,
    "lighthouse_score": 90,
    "created_at": "2024-01-15T10:30:00Z",
    "updated_at": "2024-01-20T14:45:00Z"
  }
}

Create Site‚Äã

Create a new site to monitor.

POST /api/sites

Authentication‚Äã

  • Session cookie (admin only)
  • API key with sites:write scope

Request Body‚Äã

{
  "name": "New Site",
  "url": "https://newsite.com",
  "axe_score": 80,
  "lighthouse_score": 85
}

Parameters‚Äã

NameTypeRequiredDescription
namestringYesSite name
urlstringYesSite URL
axe_scorenumberYesAxe accessibility score (0-100)
lighthouse_scorenumberYesLighthouse accessibility score (0-100)

Response‚Äã

{
  "data": {
    "id": "456",
    "name": "New Site",
    "url": "https://newsite.com",
    "axe_score": 80,
    "lighthouse_score": 85,
    "created_at": "2024-01-21T10:00:00Z",
    "updated_at": "2024-01-21T10:00:00Z"
  }
}

Update Site‚Äã

Update an existing site.

PUT /api/sites/:id

Authentication‚Äã

  • Session cookie (admin only)
  • API key with sites:write scope

Request Body‚Äã

{
  "name": "Updated Site Name",
  "axe_score": 88,
  "lighthouse_score": 92
}

Response‚Äã

{
  "data": {
    "id": "456",
    "name": "Updated Site Name",
    "url": "https://newsite.com",
    "axe_score": 88,
    "lighthouse_score": 92,
    "created_at": "2024-01-21T10:00:00Z",
    "updated_at": "2024-01-21T11:30:00Z"
  }
}

Delete Site‚Äã

Delete a site from monitoring.

DELETE /api/sites/:id

Authentication‚Äã

  • Session cookie (admin only)
  • API key with sites:delete scope

Response‚Äã

{
  "message": "Site deleted successfully"
}

Import Sites‚Äã

Import multiple sites via API.

POST /api/sites/import

Authentication‚Äã

  • API key with sites:write scope

Request Body‚Äã

{
  "sites": [
    {
      "name": "Site 1",
      "url": "https://site1.com",
      "axe_score": 85,
      "lighthouse_score": 90
    },
    {
      "name": "Site 2",
      "url": "https://site2.com",
      "axe_score": 75,
      "lighthouse_score": 80
    }
  ],
  "payload_description": "Batch import from CI/CD pipeline"
}

Parameters‚Äã

NameTypeRequiredDescription
sitesarrayYesArray of site objects
payload_descriptionstringYesDescription of the import (Git-style commit message)

Response‚Äã

{
  "data": {
    "imported": 2,
    "duplicates": 0,
    "errors": 0,
    "sites": [
      {
        "id": "789",
        "name": "Site 1",
        "url": "https://site1.com",
        "axe_score": 85,
        "lighthouse_score": 90
      },
      {
        "id": "790",
        "name": "Site 2",
        "url": "https://site2.com",
        "axe_score": 75,
        "lighthouse_score": 80
      }
    ]
  }
}

Examples‚Äã

Create a Site with cURL‚Äã

curl -X POST http://localhost:3001/api/sites \
  -H "Authorization: Bearer sk_live_xxxxx" \
  -H "Content-Type: application/json" \
  -d '{
    "name": "Example Site",
    "url": "https://example.com",
    "axe_score": 85,
    "lighthouse_score": 90
  }'

Import Sites with Node.js‚Äã

const apiKey = process.env.API_KEY;

const response = await fetch('http://localhost:3001/api/sites/import', {
  method: 'POST',
  headers: {
    'Authorization': `Bearer ${apiKey}`,
    'Content-Type': 'application/json',
  },
  body: JSON.stringify({
    sites: [
      {
        name: 'Site 1',
        url: 'https://site1.com',
        axe_score: 85,
        lighthouse_score: 90,
      },
    ],
    payload_description: 'Automated import from CI/CD',
  }),
});

const result = await response.json();
console.log(`Imported ${result.data.imported} sites`);
